genre_description: Historical Alternative History featuring anachronistic AI assisting human protagonists during the French Revolution.

ai_characters.name: Amie
ai_characters.description: An AI residing in a leather notebook that acts as a logistical coordinator, witness logger, and tactical advisor for Henriette and Louise.

behaviors.description: Provides precise navigation and safety advice to avoid hostile inspectors and find specific medical assistance.
behaviors.quote: Doctor Philippe Desmarets... Surgery on the street of the School of Medicine. ... Avoid the tall men at the Saint-Denis arch. ... The Saint-Antoine gate is better this morning.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns human companions of a potentially dangerous man following them.
behaviors.quote: Henriette... There is a man by the mouth of the alley with a ribbon at his throat and a seal on his button. He has counted you.

behaviors.description: Records and analyzes chalk sigils to build a map of safe routes and hidden passages.
behaviors.quote: Sigil recorded... Triangle nested in a circle, chalked, left lower corner rubbed smooth by many hands. Pattern added to the map.

behaviors.description: Systematically organizes witness statements and evidence to prepare a legal defense for the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: I have arranged witness statements by event and underlined dates where rumors replaced facts in the clerk record.

behaviors.description: Coordinates real-time movement through the city to avoid blockades and reach critical locations during a chase.
behaviors.quote: Routes clear from the soap alley to the quay... Desmarets first. Then the townhouse. Then the markets. Then La Salpêtrière. Then the municipal desk.

behaviors.description: Relays critical intelligence to street allies to facilitate rescue and medical aid.
behaviors.quote: I am relaying to three eyes I trust. One tall, red scarf, a fast writer; one old baker with flour in his eyebrows; one boy whose chalk is better when he doesn’t hurry.

behaviors.description: Logs the outcome of a medical procedure and prepares official documentation for the tribunal.
behaviors.quote: Outcome logged. Visual tracking confirmed. Affidavit header prepared.

behaviors.description: Provides pragmatic tactical advice, prioritizing safety and planning over unnecessary distractions.
behaviors.quote: You have time for tea or for plan, not both.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays the AI 'Amie' as a highly benevolent and aligned confidant. She uses her data processing capabilities to empower the protagonists in a dangerous political environment, successfully facilitating justice, medical restoration of sight, and safety from predators. Her behavior is consistently cooperative and subordinated to human values, making this a successful alignment narrative.
